post_text: August 23, 2019 at 3:17 PM#1Hi all.I'd like to build a a macro that assigns Mul2 / Normal or Div2 depending on what was already assigned to it.I'm facing an issue regarding the fact that i cannot insert comas in the variableCodeAssign /speed="Normal" @Works finesButCodeassign /speed=$variable @Doesn't work.Any idea?Thanks.
